partintro.para: Spring for Apache Hadoop Yarn provides integration with the Spring Framework to create and run Hadoop Yarn applications.

This document is the reference guide for Spring for Apache Hadoop project (SYARN). It explains the relationship between the Spring framework and Hadoop. The first part describes the integration wtih the Spring framework to define the base concepts and semantics of the integration and how they can be use effectively.

note.para: This project as well as Apache Hadoop Yarn are still on alpha phase meaning api's, configuration and general usage is subject to change.
